messages.subject: Funny
messages.msgSnippet: We were playing a game this afternoon called Trivia Adventure where you answer trivia questions and make your way around the board to reach each planet in the
messages.messageBody:
We were playing a game this afternoon called Trivia Adventure where you
answer trivia questions and make your way around the board to reach each
planet in the solar system. Lilly (7) was asked "Which of your organs
pumps blood through your body?" Her answer...."Uranus." Followed by peals
of laughter! Ahh ha ha !! Hey, it was a planet related game, after
all. The next funny one was..."If fish swim in a school, then whales swim
in a ?" Funny answer from my 9 yo, 'A college, of course!" They were too
cute not to share.


Angela
game-enthusiast@...




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
